package.name: explorer_canary1_sensor_config_1
package.description: CMU Explorer canary1: 2 3D medium range lidar (one velodyne and one vertically oriented ouster), IMU, 4 Cameras (the real robot has 2 fisheye cameras that together have a total of 360 degrees field of view, but 4 cameras are used in sim to get a 360 field of view since fisheyes aren't modeled in sim), Gas sensor, Pressure sensor, Magnetometer.
package.author: Fan Yang
